attributes.action: Apologise to the taxpayers of this country over the foreign aid budget payments.
attributes.additional_details: It has AGAIN been reported that taxpayer pounds taken from the poor of this country are being used to keep despots in power in foreign countries - a policy DEMANDED by David Cameron.  If he does not have the moral fortitude to resign over his bad judgement in this matter he MUST at the very least APOLOGISE to the taxpayers of this country for using their money to fund murder, mayhem and general criminality in countries around the world.
